title: Arabic 37
text: Divest not thyself of My beauteous robe, and forfeit not thy portion from My wondrous fountain, lest thou shouldst thirst forevermore.

prev.title: Arabic 36
prev.text: Rejoice in the gladness of thine heart, that thou mayest be worthy to meet Me and to mirror forth My beauty.

next.title: Arabic 38
next.text: Walk in My statutes for love of Me and deny thyself that which thou desirest if thou seekest My pleasure.
